sqlMap.select:
select ID as id, NAME as name, SEX as sex, AGE as age, BIRTHDAY as birthday, CSDSHENG as csdsheng, CSDSHI as csdshi, CSDXIAN as csdxian, CSDJDMPH as csdjdmph, BMID as bmid, BMMC as bmmc, AH as ah, SFYX as sfyx, CJRID as cjrid, CJRXM as cjrxm, CJRBMID as cjrbmid, CJRBMMC as cjrbmmc, SCLY as scly, ZSC as zsc, LASTDATE as lastdate from QIAOYC_STUDY where 1=1
and to_char(LASTDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #qssj#
and to_char(LASTDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #jzsj#
order by LASTDATE desc
select count(1) as id from QIAOYC_STUDY where 1=1
sqlMap.insert: insert into QIAOYC_STUDY ( ID, NAME, SEX, AGE, BIRTHDAY, CSDSHENG, CSDSHI, CSDXIAN, CSDJDMPH, BMID, BMMC, AH, SFYX, CJRID, CJRXM, CJRBMID, CJRBMMC, SCLY, ZSC, LASTDATE )values( #id#, #name#, #sex#, #age#, #birthday#, #csdsheng#, #csdshi#, #csdxian#, #csdjdmph#, #bmid#, #bmmc#, #ah#, #sfyx#, #cjrid#, #cjrxm#, #cjrbmid#, #cjrbmmc#, #scly#, #zsc#, sysdate )
sqlMap.update: update QIAOYC_STUDY set ID = #id#, NAME = #name#, SEX = #sex#, AGE = #age#, BIRTHDAY = #birthday#, CSDSHENG = #csdsheng#, CSDSHI = #csdshi#, CSDXIAN = #csdxian#, CSDJDMPH = #csdjdmph#, BMID = #bmid#, BMMC = #bmmc#, AH = #ah#, SFYX = #sfyx#, CJRID = #cjrid#, CJRXM = #cjrxm#, CJRBMID = #cjrbmid#, CJRBMMC = #cjrbmmc#, SCLY = #scly#, ZSC = #zsc#, LASTDATE = sysdate where 1=1 and ID = #id#
sqlMap.select: select ID as id, NAME as name, SEX as sex, AGE as age, BIRTHDAY as birthday, CSDSHENG as csdsheng, CSDSHI as csdshi, CSDXIAN as csdxian, CSDJDMPH as csdjdmph, BMID as bmid, BMMC as bmmc, AH as ah, SFYX as sfyx, CJRID as cjrid, CJRXM as cjrxm, CJRBMID as cjrbmid, CJRBMMC as cjrbmmc, SCLY as scly, ZSC as zsc, LASTDATE as lastdate from QIAOYC_STUDY where 1=1 and ID = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete from QIAOYC_STUDY where 1=1 and ID = #id#
